original_text: Now it was not written for his sake alone, that it was imputed to him;
korean_text: 그에게 의로 여겨졌다 기록된 것은 아브라함만 위한 것이 아니요

sentences.original_text: Now it was not written for his sake alone
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 그를 위해서만 기록된 것이 아니라

sentences.original_text: that it was imputed to him
